---
date: 2017-04-30 17:02
status: public
title: 'CmdProc 开源问题'
---

#github报错显示为
* Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? yes
Warning: Permanently added 'github.com,192.30.253.112' (RSA) to the list of known hosts.
Permission denied (publickey).

#解决方法时在DNS文件中添加
```C++
# Generated by NetworkManager


# No nameservers found; try putting DNS servers into your
# ifcfg files in /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts like so:
#
# DNS1=xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx
# DNS2=xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx
# DOMAIN=lab.foo.com bar.foo.com
github.com 192.30.253.112
nameserver 8.8.8.8

```

#安装tb-common-util
 chmod u+x /home/tb-common-utils/build.sh
 
  *下面的那个宏在build.sh中有用到
TBLIB_ROOT=/usr/local  /home/tb-common-utils/build.sh

#曾经编译时遇到错误
* 在编译时要及时清除make产生的.o的多余文件，在这里以前别人没删除就提交了，我修改代码之后再次进行编译发现我的代码没有生效。Make clean 后就生效了。

#这个路径应该是系统宏的安放的路径，以后的代码中应该注意这个地方
设置TBLIB_ROOT环境变量
在~/.bash_profile文件中加入，export TBLIB_ROOT=path_to_tbutil , 然后执行source ~/.bash_profile


git config --global user.name "Your Name"
git config --global user.email you@example.com



#添加.so搜索路径
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/path/to/lib

#添加.a搜索路径
LIBRARY_PATH=$LIBRARY_PATH:/path/to/lib

#添加bin搜索路径
export PATH=$PATH:/path/to/bin

#添加GCC的include文件搜索路径
export C_INCLUDE_PATH=$C_INCLUDE_PATH:/path/to/include

#添加G++的include文件搜索路径
export CPLUS_INCLUDE_PATH=$CPLUS_INCLUDE_PATH:/path/to/include
